Great Food, Great Ambience, and Excellent Service. 
- Nicer/more accessible washrooms during the game

Expensive but worth it to impress a client or family/friend. Tuna was exceptional and the wine selection was solid. Service was excellent and the  ability to save your table and visit between periods is unique.

I have been dinning/drinking at the Platinum Club since it opened. I recently attended the leaf /red wings game re. Our Waitress was simply rude. My party and I dropped nearly a grand on food and drinks + two grand on tickets just to be abused by this clearly not vetted staff personnel. I hold the management responsible. I would rather grab a hot dog and coke then risk dropping  this kind of hard earn money just to be treat with no repect.
